Somewhere in Asia in 1881, the dream of fortune attracts dozens of workers - mostly Chinese immigrants - for a mining valley. However, the only thing left in that wasteland Four brothers are eager for revenge. And to defend her honor and protect the local people, they will bring back to light a fighting style ancestor, lost for centuries. It's Wushu, an art mortal combat. Four brothers join forces to meet the challenges and become heroes - one of whom will become the greatest fighter of all time - a true legend.
